body:
Guys! Many CTH maps are pretty void based. I feel like removing the kit called fisherman is a nice idea to get a better gameplay. Many people just rod someone (mostly which they can't kil with sword) and than jump in the void so they die with their enemy. 

Its very bad for the gameplay for most people.
body_tagged:

Its very bad for the gameplay for most people.
title: Fishermans CTH

replies.body: I agree that it can ruin the gameplay at times, but maybe the kit could just be edited a little?
replies.body_tagged: I agree that it can ruin the gameplay at times, but maybe the kit could just be edited a little?

replies.body: I completely agree with this; the kit is way too OP.
replies.body_tagged: I completely agree with this; the kit is way too OP.

replies.body: You're right, it is very easy to get kills. Maybe we should add a delay before the rod can be used again?
replies.body_tagged: You're right, it is very easy to get kills. Maybe we should add a delay before the rod can be used again?

replies.body: Jozz will rage. But I agree.
replies.body_tagged: Jozz will rage. But I agree.

replies.body: Many players find it hard to get kills on Cth especially with the fast hit glitch. Although it requires little skill I think the fisherman kit is a fun addition to the game and also fun for trolling people
replies.body_tagged: Many players find it hard to get kills on Cth especially with the fast hit glitch. Although it requires little skill I think the fisherman kit is a fun addition to the game and also fun for trolling people

replies.body:
People purposely do this to me
to piss me off
replies.body_tagged:
People purposely do this to me
to piss me off

replies.body: Would it be possible to add a feature that makes it so someone can block or shift and  the fishing rod won't affect them?
replies.body_tagged: Would it be possible to add a feature that makes it so someone can block or shift and  the fishing rod won't affect them?

replies.body: Nah leave it. Its not that op.
replies.body_tagged: Nah leave it. Its not that op.

replies.body: Don't let the door hit ya where Mother Nature split ya!
replies.body_tagged: Don't let the door hit ya where Mother Nature split ya!

replies.body: Its only that 90% of all my deaths on CTH are from fishermans jumping in the void.. But they aren't op right.
